typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CuratedAddress1
CuratedAddress1 derive(source = "1") ~> CloudSalesAddress2
CloudSalesAddress2 derive(UniqueID = source + CustomerID + AddressID) ~> CloudSalesAddress3
CloudSalesAddress3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CloudSalesAddressSink1
